title: Alps no Shoujo Heidi (1979) (The Story of Heidi)
synopsis: Condensed version of the entire TV series where all the voice actors, except for Heidi and the grandfather, were replaced.
staff: [['Matsuyama, Yuushi', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Watanabe, Takeo', ['Music']], ['Spyri, Johanna', ['Original Creator']]]
